column5: Just looking for current water temperatures in N.W. Ontario. Heading for the Red Lake area on 6/18.

Northwestern Ontario is a huge region. Not only are there multiple watersheds, but climatic norms are even different. That said, I can tell you on Sunday water temps were low-60's in shallower water and in the 50's on the surface over deeper water in the central part of northwestern ontario (a little southeast of Red Lake).
